title: Why Small Businesses Should Be on TikTok
sub_head: No guarantees, but there are some things businesses can do to increase the odds of success
body:
Candace Nelson, a pastry chef and former investment banker, is co-founder of the cupcake bakery chain Sprinkles. She also is co-founder of CN2 Ventures, which invests in and incubates new business ventures.
TikTok clearly has a grip on Gen Z. But does that mean the social platform is an effective place for small- and medium-size businesses to market their products and services?
